## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mclabel">MCLabel</a></>}>
Instances of this class represent a label name in the MC file, and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mclabel">MCLabel</a> are created and uniqued by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> class. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mclabel/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
